attributes.additional_details: The school policy around lateral flow tests should be altered inline with home testing lateral flow tests and lateral flow tests within the NHS which require confirmation with a PCR test. This is causing great disruption in schools and a lack of confidence in testing with parents.
attributes.background: Ensure all pupils who have a positive lateral flow test in school have this confirmed by a laboratory PCR test to reduce the effect of false positives and unnecessary isolation of entire bubbles.
